> **Example tag bundle**
> - `definition` – A precise description of an idea, object, or process.
> - `technique` – Highlights a repeatable procedure learners should master.

> **Subject options:** `astronomy`, `astrophysics`, `spaceflight`, `mathematics`, `history-of-science`

## Overview
Outline how you will motivate the concept and connect it to prior lessons.

## Key Ideas
- Use short paragraphs and tight topic sentences.
- Reference diagrams, data, or historical context where relevant.

## Try It
Wrap short prompts in the `<Exercise>` component to give readers a quick check for understanding.
